name: steam-headless
description: docker-steam-headless provides a self-hosted, headless Steam client in Docker for remote game downloads or streaming setups. It exposes web-based management for sessions.
features: Headless Steam: Runs Steam client in Docker without physical display.
Remote access: Connects to Steam via web browser or VNC.
Game downloads: Downloads and manages Steam games on server.
Streaming support: Streams games to other devices via Steam Link or Moonlight.
Proton compatibility: Runs Windows games on Linux with Proton integration.
Save management: Backs up and syncs game saves across devices.
Workshop support: Downloads and manages Steam Workshop content.
Controller support: Passes through USB controllers for game input.
Audio streaming: Routes game audio to remote clients.
GPU passthrough: Leverages GPU acceleration for better performance.
Automated updates: Keeps games updated automatically in background.
Web interface: Manages Steam library through browser-based UI.
